    • findFileRecursively

      public static File findFileRecursively​(File startingPath, String filename)

    • setRscriptCurrent

      public static void setRscriptCurrent​(String rscript_current)
      Sets the default location of Rscript executable manually. Note that this also sets the default Rscript location for the platform (for the session).
      Parameters:
      rscript_current - path to the Rscript executable

    • setR_current

      public static void setR_current​(String r_current)
      Sets the default location of R executable manually. Note that this also sets the default R location for the platform (for the session).
      Parameters:
      r_current - path to the R executable

    • setRPaths

      public static void setRPaths​(String rscript_current, String r_current)
      Convenience method to set both Rscript and R default paths in one call.
      Parameters:
      rscript_current - path to the Rscript executable
      r_current - path to the R executable

    • getSystemSpecificRPathParameter

      public static String getSystemSpecificRPathParameter​(File file)
      Convenience method to convert parameters for R that contain a path to the correct format.
      Parameters:
      file - object for which the absolute patch is needed

    • setChatset

      public static void setChatset​(Charset charset)
      Sets charset to be used with locale in JVM environment managed by ProcessBuilder. Default charset is UTF-8.
      Parameters:
      charset - charset to encode string before send through ProcessBuilder

    • setLocale

      public static void setLocale​(Locale locale)
      Sets locale to be used with charset in in JVM environment managed by ProcessBuilder. Default locale is the current locale for this instance of JVM.
      Parameters:
      locale - locale to be set with charset in environment managed by ProcessBuilder
